text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Greenfield, California |settlement_type = City |nickname = Broccoli Capital of the World |motto = "Where Historic El Camino Real Meets Monterey Wine Country" |image_skyline = |image_caption = Aerial view of Greenfield |image_seal = |image_map = File:Monterey County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Greenfield Highlighted 0630994.svg |map_caption = Location in Monterey County, California |pushpin_map = USA |pushpin_label = Greenfield |pushpin_map_caption = Location in the United States |pushpin_relief = 1 |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = California |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Monterey |established_title = Incorporated |established_date = January 7, 1947 |named_for = Edward Greenfield |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |leader_title2 = |leader_name2 = |leader_title3 = |leader_name3 = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_sq_mi = 2.95 |area_land_sq_mi = 2.91 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.04 |area_total_km2 = |area_land_km2 = |area_water_km2 = |area_water_percent = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_ft = 289 |elevation_m = 88 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 18937 |pop_est_as_of = |pop_est_footnotes = |population_est = |population_density_sq_mi = 6507.6 |population_density_km2 = |population_metro = |timezone = Pacific |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |coordinates = |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 93927 |area_code = 831 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = |blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank1_info = , |website = }} Greenfield is a city in Monterey County, California, United States. It is in the Salinas Valley, a very productive farming area. It is known for growing vegetables and wine. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Monterey County, California
